entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as the speaker of the conversation. He talks about his father's actions and how he was locked up in Azkaban.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison for wizards and witches that is mentioned as the place where Aberforth's father was locked up.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is Aberforth's sister who has become unbalanced with magic exploding out of her. She would have been locked up in St. Mungo's if the Ministry had known about it.

entities.name: st mungo's
entities.description: St. Mungo's is a hospital for wizards and witches that is mentioned as the place where Ariana would have been locked up if the Ministry had known about her condition.

relationships.description: Aberforth's father was locked up in Azkaban for attacking the people who did something to Ariana.
If the Ministry had known about Ariana's condition, she would have been locked up in St. Mungo's.
